#### Authorizations

userApiKeyagentBotApiKey

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/update-conversation#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/update-conversation#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/update-conversation#parameter-conversation-id)

conversation\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the conversation

#### Body

application/json

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/update-conversation#body-priority)

priority

enum<string>

The priority of the conversation

Available options:

`urgent`,

`high`,

`medium`,

`low`,

`none`

Example:

`"high"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/update-conversation#body-sla-policy-id)

sla\_policy\_id

number

The ID of the SLA policy (Available only in Enterprise edition)

Example:

`1`
